query_cache_size: Query cache, please set to 0 if not enabled
sort_buffer_size: Buffer size for sorting each thread
passwordFormatError: Database password cannot contain Chinese or special characters
resetPasswordTips: This operation will change the database root user's password
savePasswordTips: Only updates the password stored in FlyEnv, does not change the database root user's password. This password is mainly used to safely stop {app} instances.
resetPasswordConfirm: This operation will change the database root user's password, are you sure you want to proceed?
databaseNameFormatError: Database name must start with a letter, 3-64 characters, and can only contain letters, numbers and underscores
userFormatError: Username must start with a letter, 3-32 characters, and can only contain letters, numbers and underscores
passwordSizeError: Password cannot be shorter than 3 characters
